content: I am downgrading my rating for this app yet again. For the last couple of months I have had to re-authorize the app's access to my Ecobee account once every 4 to 5 days. This is the only app on my Ecobee account that continuously loses it's connection. Extremely annoying!

While the app is a good idea there are too many issues. I have contacted support and done all their suggestions to no avail. The biggest problem is having to re-authorize the app with ecobee at random times. Sometimes it will ask to log back in several times a day, then it might make it a couple days before asking. I myself have to log into the Ecobee website to approve this app everytime its asks for a new login. Uninstalling and reinstalling did not work. I only have the app on one device.
Great app. Lot's of numbers. Very useful for many things.
app used to be okay, now it takes forever to load everything and you have to pay for usage reports👎

10/13/2020: Thanks for the suggestion, but that did not work either. Edit: As of 09/08/2020, the app continually stops communicating with my ecobee account. I continually need to remove the "ecobee Wrap" app from my ecobee account, then re-add. Works for a day, then stops. I am going through this validation one more time before uninstalling.It has become too much effort. Latest updates are very useful. I use this more than the app from ecobee.
Easy to use

Update - used for couple of years, after the latest update, I had to remove my 4 stars. It will not connect to my Ecobee at all. This app was better than Ecobee's own app. Now useless, I am about to delete.
I love the app, but hate the advertisements. Ads have taken over and either need to have a paid unAd version or not have them. Losing my mind!!!

back to 5 stars.. devs fixed issue! Great app! Much easier than ecobee ... And a widget! Hope dev keeps at it... I paid for it and that will only help dev make it better. I suggest rotating temp input Instead of up and down. Minor point though. Also, and most apps, widgets have this, some customization would be nice.. Colors etc.
So far so good everything worken great
Does not work. I can't get it to setup because it won't allow LastPass to fill in blanks. Deleted from phone, worthless.
Great alternative to the official app.
Outside temp is never correct. Weather forecast is way off

They have ruined this app by displaying a notice to paid users to setup Google Cloud to save and run reports. What if you simply do not wish to? Too bad! Every time you open the app you get this message to setup in Google Cloud. Every f##$$ time no matter how many times you cancel the message it appears the next time. Over and over and over. Idiotic. Just use the official app that comes from Ecobee. The people who designed this app are too incompetent to waste your time with.
Great App. Better than the manufactures app.

Love this app and use it every day for the past several years. It is so much faster and fully functional compared to the ecobee app. I love being able to generate reports when I want to see usage. Moving between the many houses and thermostats I have is so much more convenient than the official app which has improved but is still a pain to navigate. Then there is the widget and wear support which doesn't even exist with the ecobee app! Keep it up developers and yes I pay for a subscription!
Cool idea for the app, but super buggy UI. Uninstalled within 5 minutes
Ads are annoying. Can be difficult to find settings. More customizable than ecobee apl

There are some bugs with day change affecting the next morning schedule, but it's still much easier to set schedules with this app than with the Ecobee app. Unfortunately you still need the Ecobee app for a few things, but overall this one is easier to use.
Laggy since it's hard to move the temperature up and down. I like the old version much better

Not easy to navigate and find the information claimed available. Charts are also not easy to read or get information from. Colors I hope are able to be changed as they are not something I would want to keep. Maybe in time this app with input and improvements will be a good app.
A nice easy way to monitor and control my ecobee
Works great
Ecobee Wrap is easy to use and very configurable. I like being able to change how often the temperature is updated.
Intrusive Permissions - if you value your privacy at all do not install

After using the app for more than a year now I still prefer it over the native ecobee watch. It gives you a better overview of the AC status and an easier way to control it. Only problem I face is that the widget has to be restarted once a day because it doesn't show the AC Info any more.

I really like this app. Very configurable, way more options and features than the stock ecobee app. It does seem to have a bug now and then, but eventually they get fixed with updates. I do think the UI could use some improvement. The reason I'm not leaving 5 stars though is the subscription. I don't mind paying for an app to support the developers. The subscription model is ridiculous though. 16.00 a year. If that was a one time fee, I would have bought. Won't do subscriptions for apps.
Got 2nd Ecobee in the house. Charts only show information for one thermostat. Developer occasionally answers requests but offers no explanation or fix.
Great app.. Report on Humidity and saving schedules to use for winter vs Summer would be great..
*Updated: Now shows thermostat sensor as its own individual sensor. Incredibly functional app! Offers so much more than the stock ecobee app. Highly recommend. Needs graphic design help.

With the latest update of the Save & Restore function it now makes the ecobee4 perfect for my use. Thank you so much for making an app that surpasses the functionality of the manufacturer's. Great work!👍🏼
Love the tenths and the charts!
Love this app no problems so far
Much better than the official app.
Seems to be working great, so far it's definitely doing the job
Better than original app, some important functionality which lazy ecobee people will never add are here in this app. UI can be improved.
Great App , 5 stars
Should have been the official app!
app is NOT simple enough. very difficult to set schedules.
better than the ecobee app

I was too quick to give 5 stars. The new upgrade includes info at the bottom of the main floor screen. The info for inside temperature is shown in Fahrenheit degrees even if the setting calls for Celsius deg. It looks stupid to see internal temperature -6C. The outside is OK.
while thermostat is in vacation mode, the home screen in app constantly refreshes the temperature, every 1-2 seconds non stop.

waay better than the ecobee app. i actually don't use the ecobee app anymore. but the main screen could be designed better... be more polished. i can see the daily runtimes but there is no total runtime for the whole day. overall great app..

I like the app had some trouble with it not wanting to change to my away temps. It started matching the away temp to what ever the previous temp set in the house was. As in if I had the house set to 70 while I'm home and I switched to away, it would change the away temp to 70 as well. instead of changing the thermostats temp to 78 like I wanted. Also why do the reports only go to 5pm? I thought it was an issue with it being a free version restriction but I subscribed and out still stops at 5
good. could auto refresh
Great app
flawless

App has potential BUT the interface is "klunky" throughout. Interface has too much inexplicable empty space. App has too many options for configuration. Buttons are too small and fonts do not resize well. App could be very useful but the user interface needs improvement.
good
I needed an app for a second Ecobee T-stat at my church. I was already using Ecobee's app for my home. This app filled the need. I can control both of them now using my phone.
great little app... widget is super handy i would rather have these features native to ecobee though
love it

App is easy to use and provides useful information on run times. Over time our furnace run behavior became erratic.with the temperature changing from the set point of 69 degrees to 77 degrees or to 65 degrees, even though the thermostat was set to hold at 69 degrees. It became difficult to control the set point. When I deleted the program and installed the Ecobee Android program, the problem went away, and the temperature stabilized.
Still learning how to use the App
happy with it
only reason to keep my ecobee 4 on the wall. way better than official ecobee app. just if could have a way in setting to have a much bigger font any way really good
generally, it's a good app very useful for controlling your ecobee device. there could be some room to improve like the user interface for making it easier for the user. thanks.
Love the app and widget is nice too.
works well, very acurate to the decimal point, does what it's supposed to.
Not as detailed as I expected but still a decent app
Does not work with Samsung Note 9. Locks up and freezes.
Surprised how reliability it integrates with Ecobee and best of all, adds widget functionality, which the Ecobee native app lacks.
Perfect app with everything I need..!
Had a problem with Geo fence. Got in touch with them and it was fixed with in 24 hours. This is one of the best apps I have ever used.
Nice and useful app. Would like a one-time payment option like the Windows app
I use it exponentially more than the default app. It's very useful if you don't have a set schedule but want to easily manage your thermostat.
Way too much ads. I removed the app after couple hours

I have a long list of suggestions that I'll post to the Google+ Community and/or send in an email, but here I'll just say that I like what I see! My ecobee is in a summer cottage. It's shut down and winterized every winter, and I don't use the furnace in the summer. I just use the furnace for a month or so around May and again in September. Clearly, I'm not about to pay for a subscription. The ads don't bother me much but in addition to all the feedback I have to send I'd like to contribute some money your way, so please please please bring back the option of a one-time purchase!
Cool all info on one screen. Old skool gui. Works well. Adds are too much. Would pay .99 Prolly uninstall eventually

Small ads at the bottom or top of the app, I could live with that but having those ads that require you to watch full screen for 5, 10, 15 seconds. Very disruptive especially if I am only opening the app to make a quick temperature change. I have to watch a 10 second ad to do this? I was going to buy the app because it really is a great app, but I won't subscribe to it and pay forever. One time charge and I would change the rating and but it.

I keep getting failed internal server error. I cannot adjust the 
temperature from manage comforts. Aesthetically it's good but the functions 
are kind weak.

Lose the adds or change to a one time fee and this app will be 5 stars. 
Ridiculous that it is subscription based paid app
Much better than the factory ecobee app. This is the way it should be!

Waaaay better than the stock ecobee app. This allows you to add more than 3 
comfort settings, which is a huge benefit. It's also a lot easier to see 
all the key temperature info right on the main screen, instead of clicking 
through the menus in the stock app. Lastly, this app shows you everything 
you'd see in the HomeIQ web app (which isn't even available in the stock 
mobile app.

The one thing I'd like to see added is the ability to setup rules based on 
weather. For example the house temp stay within 15 °F of outside. This way 
your ac won't run 24/7 when it's 100° outside.

This has way more power options than the ecobee app! I highly recommend for 
power users that want more out of their ecobee.

This is great - - easier to use than the stock app and it gives you more 
information.
Rarely works on Android Galaxy S8+

Many annoying pop ups and ads, not sure if I will keep. Good concept, poor 
implementation.

Love the intent, app seeks to offer more insightful data from the ecobee. 
Understand the need to generate revenue, but the ads are embarrassing and 
inappropriate. The added functionality does not justify the price range or 
the time lost from ads in my opinion. The UI leaves room for improvement.

Allows for more insight into the ecobee thermostat. More easily shows 
remote sensor temperatures and daily, weekly usage.
Work great with ecobee.
Great addition to the ecobee app with reports and other analysis features.
Great integration. Prefer it to the native app.
Is good

Excellent addition to the main Ecobee app. I can see what is going on, 
trends and historical operation of my system, much easier and change 
setting quicker. Very clean design, maybe boring, with most all the same 
options of the desktop/web based client.
Not graphically sexy, but super useful and clean. Active developer support, and focused on the right things.
Great supplement app to the Ecobee app. Love the graphs.
Great app for my new echobee4.

Design is so-so. But the functionality and reliability surpass the official ecobee app by so much you wonder if ecobee has any employees in their offices. I honestly think they don't. However I do think they left a 6 month old chimp named BoBo to do their app development. Now understand BoBo was only provided 1 computer, an Alexa, and a life time supply of bananas to program ecobees Android app. BoBo is really trying, but if we give him another year he may be able to put out something with as much functionality as this app. COME ON BOBO! WE ARE ALL ROOTING FOR YOU! Until he figures out how to update the app on Google play, just download this.

This app allows you to import/export your schedule.  No other smart thermostat system has that capability through an app.  This means that if you have a different Winter or Summer electric kWh rate plan, it's possible to switch between the two easily, saving a bunch of money over time.
Don't like the ads. Icons too small for my old eyes to see w/o glasses & seldom have glasses when app needed
Much better app than Ecobee's
Works great!
Keeps asking me to log in. No forgot password. Otherwise a good app
Easy to use, useful
App won't update when updates are provided. Inconsistent.

Great app. Much better than the ecobee provided app.  It has been working fine, however, after yesterday's update, it incorrectly showing the avg inside temp to -5 and keep alerting me. Otherwise app is works great.

Way more useful than the standard App.  I wish I could remove the off button or the notification window entry, because I have accidentally turned off my furnace twice and woken up to a freezing house.
This is a great companion app for the Ecobee.

Just started using the app and seems very simple to use, but I can't give it a good score on my first impression due to issues using Celsius.  I'm confused about the general settings showing a mix of Fahrenheit and Celsius. The alert level default for outside high was 90 and outside low was 40 even though I am using Celsius. I can go into the selection and change it to what looks like Celsius but I'm not confident that it is using Celsius for these values.  You should us °C and °F everywhere in the app to eliminate any confusion.
I will give it 4 stars but the price for the full version is huge.16.99 cad
Have used it for a day.  Does what it says.  Reports are intriguing.  No obvious bugs yet.
Great tool for helping to get the heat pump and aux heat sorted when temps have been below freezing.
Great app, but please provide a method to disable the "new version available" prompt. That is what Play Store is for!
Works as advertised. I like being able to see how long the furnace and fan are running
Not showing correct thermostat temperature.

I like the summary screen a lot showing all the different room sensors on one View. This app would be outstanding if you were able to set an alert/notification per room sensor. I use a sensor in a room (well house) that is not used in a comfort setting and it would be helpful to notifications if the temperature dropped to freezing.
Night and day improvement over ecobee supplied app. Would be nice if paid features were listed in description.
MUCH easier to use than the manufacturer's  app. This was what I expected from the ecobee app and did not get. Bought it after 1 day and love it.

Great app but I haven't figured out how to view 2nd stage activity in reports. Hey SupremeVue is there a way to see how long 2nd stage is running in reports? I know the data is there because I can see this data on the ecobee portal on my PC. If not, could you advise if you would look at that down the road.
Running along with official Ecobee app for my new Ecobee4. Not flashy but fully functional. Will update after more time. Well worth the install and probably the $.

Much better than the official ecobee app!  Is it possible to get the graphs/reports to show the inside temp of a specific thermostat (or sensor) as it seems to only be able to show the average. This was OK when I had only one thermostat, but now the reports are mostly useless after I added a thermostat for a second zone in my house. Am I missing some step that allows selecting the source of the report temperatures?
Cleanly fills gaps in ecobee app for me (graphing and widget), highly recommended.
Great app for viewing the status and examining the operation of your ecobee thermostat.

Fantastic app and amazing support. The app, while not as flashy as the stock app, is far faster and more reliable while providing all of the functionality in a more efficient manner.  The developers included a feature request I made in less than a week and were gracious and helpful.
WOW I wonder what the purchase app does.
Garbage. Free app provided with device is much better. I purchased the pro version, waste of money
Connection problems, control issues
What the manufacturer should have supplied. You saved me from replacing my stat. Thanks!

I do like the interface and the fact the app has an easy way to set the thermostat quickly.  How ever I do not like the weather feature currently added to this version.  You can see the forecast for the next few days, but it fails to give the forecast for the current day.  Something that missed.  Weather being a feature is not really needed since the thermostat already gives weather information or you can easily get that via weather apps and the web.
So far no glitches. Works as described.

I like the colorful display as opposed to the Ecobee black display. There is a bit of a learning curve here due to the layout being substantially different than the Ecobee layout, but there certainly is a lot that can be done from this app. I actually like the Ecobee geo-fencing better as the area can be expanded to cover an almost unlimited distance, but there is always IFTTT available to do that. This is a maturing product that is well on its way to becoming the preferred phone app for managing an Ecobee stat. Kudos for a job well done.

Really like the app; much more functional than the official app. Could we have a setting to change the black text within the app to white? Trying to have a black background but some text is unreadable. Thank you!

Great app! Functional and very easy to use. The new interface is not friendly and appears a bit clunky. Was able to switch back to old interface though. With the old interface it is VERY easy to turn off the entire system - this happened to me a couple of times.
Recent update removed my schedule settings
I like all the features but I have the display set to celcius, but when it comes time to set the geofence or schedule, I'm forced to use fahrenheit.. otherwise it would be a perfect app!

More functionality than the official ecobee app. I can use this to add new "comfort settings" which is not possible in the official app. Also, widgets! Doesn't look like I can change the humidifier settings, but that's not something that I ever really want to change anyway once it's set up. Would be nice if I could see the HomeIQ reports, but as far as I know those are only available on the ecobee web portal. It does have similar reports, though.
Better than ecobee app
Really like app. I have been using for couple days now.
Clean design. Responsive, highly configurable. Includes excellent HomeIQ-style reports.
This version is much better and easier to understand

It's amazing to find such a simple third party application does more than the official Ecobee app.  As of this review, the official app doesn't do the following: - See exact temperature to the first decimal. - See temperature reported by each sensor. - Quickly and effortlessly apply any custom comfort setting (official app only allows "home for now" and "away for now"). - Easily set comfort setting across multiple days in the schedule. Official app is fairly convoluted. - See runtime report (only available online)  Ecobee Wrap does all the above in a simple and basic interface. It's look won't win awards but I'll take functionality over looking pretty.

I wish you would quit harassing me to rate the app, I've only had it two days.  That being said, it is a great app.  I downloaded it so I could look at the temperature history for my system.  Only complaint is it does not go far enough, where is the RH logging, or the ability to change the system configurations  like staging and deadband?  See Ecobee app for Windows Phone.  It is a good start for an Ecobee controller and if it was as full featured as it's Windows brethren I would pay the$13 on the spot.  In its current configuration it is worth $5. Thanks for the great app!

This app has so many more features  than Ecobee's proprietary app and for this reason deserves a 5 Star rating.  Enabling the user to create Confort Settings is huge and this can't be done by the Ecobee app.  Might I recommend providing emojis for widget use so we can better identify our created Comfort Settings.  The numerical widget representation is difficult to remember. Lastly,  please benchmark with Honeywell's app for a cleaner presentation.
Works great
At last! An intuitive Ecobee app. Has widgets! Well worth purchasing the upgrade. Just do it
Fixed! now works with my Daikin minisplit. Not the sexiest UI,  but so far it does everything I need!
Would be nice if this app had minimum minutes for fan setting like the original Ecobee app.
Works great!  Nice add on functionality and reporting not contained in the Ecobee app.  Keep up the good work!

Good ideas.. works decent. Needs polish, and better visual appearance, widget great idea, but need more options or a simple transparent background with simple temperature overlay with system status icon.. so can say blend in next to time, date, weather widget etc.. sometimes less is more. Keep up the good work, as there are some handy features that the stock ecobee app does not have.
Customer support was excellent after reporting an issue with the app. Quick Response!

Love that this app starts up so much faster than the original one. Great for making quick changes to the thermostat. Would be perfect if there were buttons to quickly switch to a comfort setting and hold. The original app doesn't support this, neither does the thermostat itself, but it's possible, I am using this functionality from my Smartthings hub via custom app. For example I can manually switch to 'Watch TV' when I am in the TV room.
Update: looks like the bugs are all squashed and the app is working well. Thanks for the quick response and continuous improvements.
Better than ecobee's actual app, but not very visually appealing.
Can't believe ecobee doesn't have the options in its app. Graphs of usage and outdoor temp display as well as ability to edit and view schedules. Great app
So much more functional than the boring official app and love that they are constantly coming out with new features or fixes.  Keep up the good work guys!

Has worked without issues since my last review about a year ago. Love the usage reports with the bars and reference temps. Also the readout in tenths. Would do 5 stars but still have to go to the official site to alter my schedule. Developer has been responsive if issues occur, and when you email them with comments or problems.
Love the app and the features. Please work on appearance and material design to get 5 stars. Thanks for the work.

Faster and provides more detailed info than the 'official' ecobee app, also support is great- very responsive. I love the usage reporting feature, makes it easy to see what your HVAC system is doing. The ads are a bit annoying but I totally understand where the developer is coming from, they have to make money somehow. It is definitely worth the $6 to purchase premium version.

OMG the new design is awesome - great improvement over the previous! Love the new reports! Much better than the official ecobee app. Love the Wear integration on my watch and the added features. The app is also much faster perhaps because the interface is simpler.  Definitely a great trade off!

It seems like a good enough app, although I don't see a terrific number of new features over the regular ecobee app, but it forces me to reauthorize the app every time I load it.  That's a bit ridiculous. Deleting.
I was really enjoying this app and just about ready to purchase to silence the annoying ads, but today's release causes reported usage to consistently crash!  That was the best feature.
I have 2 thermostats and I like the usage chart showing how long each one ran during the hour in a 1 day view. I don't really use it for anything else.
Have an Ecobee?  GET THIS APP! Great job on updating Usage charts guys!  Solid team supporting this app, fast to fix/respond. Never use factory app. Thx!
Ads are very intrusive.
Old slider is back and working perfect. App loads, works and always logs in. Great work!!

App is authorized with the ecobee account but everything fails to load once connected. nothing appears in the app, just a continuous loading circle. I allowed all app permissions and it still does not function.
Super sensitive can't set the new temp bc the slider will jump by like 10 degrees simply by barely rotating the dial. Plz revert!
Works great. I really like this app. Great layout and function. However the design is lacking polish and refinement. It works great just needs to look great. Still my go to app for ecobee.

Fast, convenient, efficient to use.  Great to have the one decimal place current temp. Got amazingly fast response to a suggested enhancement & nice email exchange thanking me!  Keep up the great work.

The graphic design is not great, but it loads much faster than the OEM app. All of the essential information is easier to get to and less is buried in sub-menus than stock. Wear integration is minimal and unattractive. It would be great if temperature could be adjusted from a watch and if material design was applied throughout. Nice work, so far, and definitely an app worth paying for if those improvements are made.
I don't see it on my watch at all, and there is no mention of it in the faq or settings
UI needs lots of work. Not much value-added.
Works great and is easy to use.
Easy to use and super convenient

Nice start folks. I'd suggest putting all the sensors on one page. Don't bother trying to draw them. Pixelation looks unprofessional. What's the back end like? Are you using an official Ecobee API? Are all network transmissions encrypted with TLS or the like?
Would be nice to try widget for free.
Works great

I love my ecobee3 thermostat and the "Ecobee Wrap" is a terrific app. The layout is clean with essential information on the main screen. I especially like the sensor selection across the top bar. The temperature readings on the bottom is a great idea also. And yes, i found the reports - very nice. THANK YOU DEVELOPERS!
All world is using Celsius. Who knows what units are used in this app.

Love this app. It's so much simpler than the ecobee app. Intuitively allows me to swipe between my thermostats and make quick temperature changes or set away mode. I really like the fact that I can track my usage as well, something the ecobee app doesn't do at all. The interface is not all that inspiring.... hopefully the developers can figure out a way to make it look less like it was designed in the '90's but keep the simplicity.

It reads accurately, but not a big fan of the design and you have to pay for the app? It's enough money spend for ecobee3, $249 plus tax, and this beta app wants us to pay for a feature? You will have to sell more than that. Maybe you can do notification when heat/fan comes on and turn off.
